reviews.review: Until Valve starts caring less about the money they make on gambling and more about actually banning cheaters this game is a 1/10. The WORST mistake they ever made was to go F2P like everyone else. Go the other direction. Make it $100 so a cheater has to REALLY be an idiot to want to play and eliminate everyone playing on a potato pc.
very fun and enjoyable game, pog champ
